feat: implement smart pre-push quality checks to prevent CI failures (HODGE-295)

## What Changed
- Added .husky/pre-push hook with smart selective checks (4.3KB bash script)
- Created 10 smoke tests verifying hook configuration and behavior
- Added comprehensive documentation in docs/pre-push-hooks.md
- Recorded 7 architectural decisions for implementation approach
- Implemented npm audit caching in .hodge/.cache/ directory

## Why This Change
GitHub Actions were failing on npm audit and prettier checks, causing CI/CD
pipeline failures after code was pushed. This pre-push hook catches these
issues locally before they reach the remote repository, saving CI compute
resources and preventing broken builds.

## Technical Details
- Smart branch detection: strict checks on main/develop/release/hotfix
- Cache invalidation on package-lock.json changes
- HODGE_STRICT=true environment variable forces all checks
- Bash implementation for portability and performance
- Integration with existing husky git hooks setup

Closes HODGE-295
